# Visual Customization

**acvt** comes with a polished, professional default theme based on the [Nord color palette](https://www.nordtheme.com/). However, it is fully customizable to match your personal brand or institutional requirements.

## The Default Theme

The default design features:
*   **Colors:** A cool, arctic blue-grey palette (Nord).
*   **Fonts:** *Roboto* for headers and *Source Sans Pro* for body text.
*   **Layout:** A clean, two-column grid for the header and a structured timeline layout for CV entries.

## Customizing via YAML

You can easily override the defaults in your document header without touching any code.

### Colors

Change the primary accent color (used for names, dates, and highlights).

```yaml
style:
  color-accent: "cc0000" # A deep red
```

### Fonts

You can specify any font installed on your system (or available via Typst).

```yaml
style:
  font-header: "Montserrat"
  font-text: "Open Sans"
```

## Advanced Styling (Typst)

For deep customization, you can modify the Typst definitions directly in the extension folder (`_extensions/acvt/typst/`).

*   **`03-definitions-styling.typ`:** Contains all color and font definitions.
*   **`typst-show.typ`:** Controls the rendering of standard Markdown elements (headings, quotes).

*Note: modifying extension files directly might make updates harder in the future.*
